title: YAMIU Travel Shoe Bags Set of 4 Waterproof Nylon with Zipper for Men & Women, Black
descriptions:
YAMIU Travel Shoe Bags – Set of 4, Waterproof, Lightweight, Black

Simple and handy bags for your shoes and more. Easy to open, easy to carry, and keeps things clean.

What you get:
- 4 bags total
- 2 Standard bags: fit shoes up to size 10
- 2 X-Large bags: fit shoes size 10–14

Easy to use:
- Wide, center zipper: smooth and sturdy, simple to open and close
- Lightweight nylon: easy on the hands and easy to pack
- Waterproof fabric: helps keep moisture and dust away

Helpful for:
- Travel: keep dirty shoes away from clean clothes
- Gym: carry sneakers to and from workouts
- Home storage: keep shoes dust-free in the closet
- Also works as a makeup or toiletries bag

Quality you can trust:
- Strong, custom-made zippers
- Durable nylon
- Lifetime warranty for quality issues

Color: Black

How to use:
1) Place your shoes or items inside the bag.
2) Zip along the center zipper.
3) Put the bag in your suitcase, gym bag, or closet.

Tip: Use Standard for smaller shoes. Use X-Large for bigger shoes or boots.

Simple, tidy, and made to last.
